reviewText:
Only German tanks were reviewed and very little was said about Russian tanks that opposed them.  The maps that were used were rather poor.  The first map used was green in color and made it difficult to follow the location of both armies.  The maps that followed were shifted in direction and the time on screen was short.  I guess I am used to the maps used on the Battlefield videos that are excellent and these fall short.  The tank battles that followed were short and lacking
in detail.
